item.title: Ben E King - Stand By Me
item.description:
Ukulele play along - very easy - in C Major
Stand By Me - Ben E King
This is one of the first songs we learn and the ukuleles in the video match the colour of the chords we use (Rainbow method).
The audio has been altered to fit the easy ukulele chords so it sounds much higher than the original. It does suit a female or child's voice better.
In the Key Of C Maj
Using the chords: C Am F G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
